question: What is the theme of ‘World Bee Day 2020’?
explanation:
The United Nations has been celebrating the World Bee Day on May 20, every year, to raise awareness of the importance of pollinators. The day also highlights the threats faced by pollinators and their contribution to sustainable development.
This year, World Bee Day focusses on bee production and practices adopted by beekeepers to support their livelihoods. A virtual event was planned for celebrating Bee day under theme "Bee Engaged". This will highlight the importance of traditional knowledge related to beekeeping and the use of bee-derived products and services.
